name: Lost In The Woods (petunio123)
description:
This game was made for the liminal space jam and it has some areas that are "liminal" but mostly it is just the sense of lonliness.

Contiue wandering through the desolate, foggy, woods and you may find something. Or not. I just got an erupting sense of deja vu whie writing this, almost like I wrote this before. 

This game is very "bare bones" content-wise and more content may be added in the future.

Arrow keys to move. Up to go forwards, down to go backwards, left to turn leftwards and right to turn rightwards.

You cant die....

                                                                                                                                ...yet. Like I said this is a WIP.
